resources.string: Welcome to Geo-Ace. The purpose of this quiz is to test your geography knowledge. You will be asked 6 questions. Each question will ask you to select the correct continent in which the given country is located. There will be 3 continents to choose from. Once you have selected your choice, swipe left to progress to the next question. You will be shown your results after completing the quiz. Good Luck!
What continent is the following country located in?
Swipe left to progress once you have selected your answer.
